meanings.sent1: The dowp didn't understand the simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a dowp and make the same mistake twice.
meanings.sent3: The dowp thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: He felt like a dowp when he realized he had been talking to a mirror.
meanings.sent5: Being a dowp can sometimes lead to funny situations.

meanings.sent1: She slipped on the wet floor and landed on her dowp.
meanings.sent2: It's important to sit comfortably on your dowp.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked the vase over with its tail right onto my dowp!
meanings.sent4: After the long hike, his dowp felt like it had its own heartbeat.
meanings.sent5: The cold bench made her dowp numb in minutes.
